transArray.content: The location of the hotel is very good and the front desk service is also very friendly. Recommend everyone to stay

A word of praise is enough to make us feel grateful. Only by continuing to work hard can we live up to our expectations. Dear guest, thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and for recognizing our work. Your support is the greatest encouragement for our work. We will continue to work hard to provide you with a more comfortable and convenient stay experience. The entire hotel Our employees look forward to your visit every time and wish you every success in your work! General Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
